akas from release info: Fear Files: Darr Ki Sachchi Tasveerein (original title)

1.title: Baalo Ka Guchcha

episode of.title: Fear Files: Darr Ki Sachchi Tasveerein (TV Series 2012– )

1.plot: Arpita, a younger daughter-in-law, and her newborn son are given a grand welcome back at their house. On the consecutive nights, Arpita observes some paranormal activities at the house but her family dismisses them as her delusions. As these activities grow in their intensity night by night, on one fine night, a completely possessed Arpita sets out to kill her infant son. This action alarms the family. As the doctors fail to explain this abnormal behavior, the mother-in-law summons a priest.

2.title: The Crematorium

episode of.title: Fear Files: Darr Ki Sachchi Tasveerein (TV Series 2012– )

2.plot: On a drunken outing, a boy pees on a funeral pyre in spite of warnings from friends. This enrages the corpse who comes to seek revenge.

3.title: The Temple of Spirits

episode of.title: Fear Files: Darr Ki Sachchi Tasveerein (TV Series 2012– )

3.plot: A temple in Rajasthan is said to house spirits. And it is said when you visit it, do not make the mistake of calling someone. For you do not know which spirit will accompany you back home to wreck havoc.

4.title: The Eclipse

episode of.title: Fear Files: Darr Ki Sachchi Tasveerein (TV Series 2012– )

4.plot: A woman doesn't listen to her mother-in-law's advice of not stepping out of the house during a solar eclipse. The pregnant woman gives birth to a demon child.

5.title: The Banyan Tree

episode of.title: Fear Files: Darr Ki Sachchi Tasveerein (TV Series 2012– )

5.plot: A haunted forest that has a banyan tree in which resides the evil spirit of a departed soul. A family ventures into the forest at night only to get possessed by the spirit and the tree who wants to claim another victim.

6.title: The Headless Ghost

episode of.title: Fear Files: Darr Ki Sachchi Tasveerein (TV Series 2012– )

6.plot: A residential school situated in Kurseong is haunted by the headless ghost. Two students who stay back during the winter vacations unravel a bloody past and unleash two ghosts who seek revenge.

62.title: Raj & Maya

episode of.title: Fear Files: Darr Ki Sachchi Tasveerein (TV Series 2012– )

62.plot: Raj waits for Maya on the film sets and then gets angry at her for her later arrival. Thereafter, Maya gets angry on him after he taunts her by commenting on her age. Later, in the midnight, Maya takes her witch form and sacrifices Raj to the Kaal Devta for getting her beauty back. On the other hand, Sameer and Anaya get worried about Raj and they decide to find the truth. Next, they go to Maya's house and are shocked to find Maya's truth. Later, Anaya saves Sameer by killing Maya.

63.title: Saahil

episode of.title: Fear Files: Darr Ki Sachchi Tasveerein (TV Series 2012– )

63.plot: Sahil is an actor who delivers back-to-back flops. This makes the directors skeptical of working with him. Anant, his manager and friend, advises him to consider taking up a low-budget film. Sahil agrees and heads for Khuldara to shoot for the movie. Ankita follows him there after receiving a message asking her to join him. Further, Sahil confides in Anant about a spirit that follows him and wants to kill Ankita. Later, at the police station, Sahil confesses everything.

66.title: Godwoman

episode of.title: Fear Files: Darr Ki Sachchi Tasveerein (TV Series 2012– )

66.plot: Self-styled Godwoman Rati Maa blesses her devotees and they sing songs in her praise. Afterward, Rati sees a strange black hooded figure walking around and she screams in fear. Thereafter, Rati starts having strange dreams about the hooded figure and he tells Rati that he is her past. Rati then tells about her past as a junior artist to Sanjay and she also tells him how she murdered Ajay for cheating on her. Later, Sanjay arrives in the forest police and finds Rati behaving abnormally.

67.title: Buried

episode of.title: Fear Files: Darr Ki Sachchi Tasveerein (TV Series 2012– )

67.plot: Tina and Amit visit his uncle and aunt. They are delighted to see how pretty Tina is. After that, Tina and Amit share a romantic moment. After some time, she is possessed by an evil spirit. Amit then tries to comfort her but he refuses to believe whatever she tells him. A disappointed Tina wants to leave the house but Amit refuses to listen to her. The following day, a holy man comes home to drive away the evil spirit that has taken control of Tina's body.

70.title: Two Sisters

episode of.title: Fear Files: Darr Ki Sachchi Tasveerein (TV Series 2012– )

70.plot: The studious Swetha and her notorious younger sister, Sakshi, live in small town, Bihar. Swetha falls in love with her classmate, Mohan. One fine day, Sakshi sneaks Swetha out of her class and both of them go to meet Mohan at a park. At the park, Swetha's father witnesses them together. Subsequently, he successfully gets Mohan killed by his henchmen. In turn, Swetha threatens to file a case against him. To this, her father hangs her to a tree and kills her. Will Swetha's ghost get her revenge?

71.title: The Haunted Hotel

episode of.title: Fear Files: Darr Ki Sachchi Tasveerein (TV Series 2012– )

71.plot: An old royal palace is turned into a grand hotel by Prince Uday Raj. But on the opening night, some sinister events take place. A chandelier falls on the prince as he is addressing the hotel guests on the opening night, but luckily he makes a last-minute escape. Later that night, his uncle commits suicide under mysterious circumstances in room number 326. Similar events continue during the next few days with the death of a waiter and prince's uncle's wife.

74.title: The Angel

episode of.title: Fear Files: Darr Ki Sachchi Tasveerein (TV Series 2012– )

74.plot: An old royal palace is turned into a grand hotel by Prince Uday Raj. But on the opening night, some sinister events take place. A chandelier falls on the prince as he is addressing the hotel guests on the opening night, but luckily he makes a last-minute escape. Later that night, his uncle commits suicide under mysterious circumstances in room number 326. Similar events continue during the next few days with the death of a waiter and prince's uncle's wife.

75.title: Happy Family

episode of.title: Fear Files: Darr Ki Sachchi Tasveerein (TV Series 2012– )

75.plot: A happy Family moves into a new house only to discover a presence of a young boy whose spirit creates havoc and destruction.

76.title: Lost

episode of.title: Fear Files: Darr Ki Sachchi Tasveerein (TV Series 2012– )

76.plot: Chinmay and Amita get lost while trekking in the dense jungle of Chandoli. They start running when they hear a strange sound and Amita falls in a trapping pit. A man named Suresh Joglekar helps Amita get out of the pit and invites them to stay in his house. He claims that he lives with his wife but has to be locked in a room as she has a contagious disease. Initially, Amita and Chinmay trust the man but with time his actions get weirder and they can feel that something is wrong with the house.

78.title: The Maratha Artifact

episode of.title: Fear Files: Darr Ki Sachchi Tasveerein (TV Series 2012– )

78.plot: Govind succeeds in convincing his brother to excavate Maratha artifacts from their land to exhibit in a museum. Subsequently, two daily wage laborers find a golden statue of a knight during their excavation. As they try to steal the artifact, a headless knight kills them. Despite Kalyani's resistance, Govind and his brother take the statue back to their home. At the home, a series of mishaps unfurl as the brother's son, Prahar, gets possessed by the ghost of the headless Maratha knight.

80.title: The Water Spirit

episode of.title: Fear Files: Darr Ki Sachchi Tasveerein (TV Series 2012– )

80.plot: Harmeet's friends tell him to not enter the pond but he refuses to listen to them. He goes into the pond to get a cricket ball and gets sucked into the ground. After some time, Alka is concerned because her father-in-law attempts to break one of the walls in the house because he hears noises. Ranjeet's father then instructs him to put him in a home if he thinks that something is wrong with his mind. The following day, the police come to the house after hearing about Ranjeet's murder.

81.title: Djinn

episode of.title: Fear Files: Darr Ki Sachchi Tasveerein (TV Series 2012– )

81.plot: Ayub's mother welcomes him and his wife to the house and requests him to distribute sweets to their neighbors. Ayub's brother then gives his wife a tour of the house. Later, that night, Ayub's wife finds torn paper and lime in their room. She then gets a fright when Ayub sneaks up behind her. He further tries to get close to his wife but hears strange noises. The following day, Ayub surprises his wife by decorating the room with candles, after which he asks her to dance with him.

84.title: The Asylum

episode of.title: Fear Files: Darr Ki Sachchi Tasveerein (TV Series 2012– )

84.plot: Anirudh gets overjoyed when he gets a big house called Mukti Bhavan for a small amount of money. But when he moves in the house with his wife Ritika and son Akash, they feel something sinister about their abode. Akash sees some ghosts around the house but keeps this information hidden from his parents. Later, Ritika goes out to buy some groceries for her household. But when she mentions the name of Mukti Bhavan, the shopkeeper runs away, extremely scared.

88.title: The Piano

episode of.title: Fear Files: Darr Ki Sachchi Tasveerein (TV Series 2012– )

88.plot: In order to support their daughter's musical talents, Milind and Alka plan to buy a piano for her. They get tense on seeing the high prices but soon come across an advertisement by Mrs. Braganza. Milind jumps at the opportunity as she is giving away her piano for free. When he goes to take it, she tells him that the piano was built by her grandfather from the wood of a blood tree held sacred by tribal people. Later, when the piano is set up at the family's home, strange incidents start happening.

92.title: The Hospital

episode of.title: Fear Files: Darr Ki Sachchi Tasveerein (TV Series 2012– )

92.plot: The ward boy and the watchman of a hospital are puzzled after they hear screams coming from inside the hospital. The ward boy then points out that he has been trying to find the source of these voices but has been unsuccessful. Later, a girl named Radha, who is in a comatose state, is admitted to the hospital. The two ward boys take her to her room and when one of them tries to leave the room, she holds his hand, leaving him scared.

93.title: The Orphanage

episode of.title: Fear Files: Darr Ki Sachchi Tasveerein (TV Series 2012– )

93.plot: Nandini and Nikhil adopt Shruti. Over a period of time, Shruti reveals to Nandini that she has been haunted by three ghosts ever since she was in the orphanage. Gradually, even Nandini catches a glimpse of a couple of those ghosts in her house. However, her husband is too rational to believe in their theories. She even makes a futile attempt at taking help from the concerned official at the orphanage. A former watchman at the orphanage later reveals to the couple the story of the ghosts.

96.title: The Forest

episode of.title: Fear Files: Darr Ki Sachchi Tasveerein (TV Series 2012– )

96.plot: Sanjana has a nightmare where she sees herself dressed in a traditional attire and is followed by a spirit. She wakes up screaming. Priya, who is by her side, comforts her and asks her to go back to sleep. The next day Sanjana and her friends set out on a trek in the Surajgarh forests. The guide warns them that the forest is haunted and tells them to stay together all the time. However, Sanjana reaches a tree which reminds her of the nightmare and she stops there with Priya for a while.

100.title: The Mummy

episode of.title: Fear Files: Darr Ki Sachchi Tasveerein (TV Series 2012– )

100.plot: A team of archaeologists excavates a casket containing the mummified body of a ruler from ancient India named Raja Harshvardhan. Despite his secretary's skepticism against opening the casket, the head archaeologist continues his study on this topic. The same night, the security guard at the archaeology department is murdered as he tries to steal the dagger from the casket. Following a row of mysterious murders after that, some people suspect the hand of a supernatural force behind these deaths.

101.title: The Lake

episode of.title: Fear Files: Darr Ki Sachchi Tasveerein (TV Series 2012– )

101.plot: On Shambhavi's insistence, Vishnu takes her to his ancestral bungalow along with Neelam and Anay. On reaching there, Vishnu's grandmother asks them to stay away from the lake. Later that night, Shambhavi and Vishnu have a romantic moment near the lake. The following morning, Shambhavi gets scared when she sees the spirit of a woman dressed as a bride. Vishnu's grandmother confides in them about the secret of the lake. The next day, she is shocked to see the spirit's mark on Shambhavi's feet.

104.title: The Kathakali Dancer

episode of.title: Fear Files: Darr Ki Sachchi Tasveerein (TV Series 2012– )

104.plot: Vishwa, a Kathakali director, picks Renu as the lead character for his upcoming project. This decision does not sit well with another dancer in the crew named Aarti. In her attempts to hurt Renu, Aarti creates a misconception between Renu and her boyfriend Pradeep. She further works on her style to replace Renu as the lead. Surprisingly, Renu's dead body drops on to the stage during a rehearsal. Following this are a series of paranormal activities around the major characters of Renu's life.

105.title: The Eunuch

episode of.title: Fear Files: Darr Ki Sachchi Tasveerein (TV Series 2012– )

105.plot: A childless couple, Kamal and her husband, visits an occultist who is well-known for achieving the impossible. When they express their desire to have a child, he advises them to sacrifice a eunuch to please the goddess. Kamal becomes pregnant shortly after they follow his advice. Three months later, when she confides in her husband about a scary dream she had, he admits to being haunted by the same spirit. Frightened by the recent happenings, they turn to the occultist for advice.
